channel.title: New Faction: The Ghosts
channel.description:
Note: the following is non-canon, and all fiction.
Ghost Leader (Ghost Faction) Passive - 1) Ghost || Speak to the Ghosts at night. Day - 1) Lead || Send a Private message to all Ghosts (oo) Night - 1) Order || Convert a player to the Ghosts tonight. (oo) 2) Gaze || Determine the Kings Faction. Can only be done after day 4. (1 use)
Necromancer (Ghost Faction) Passive - 1) Ghost || Speak to the Ghosts at night. Day - 1) Dead Or Alive || Speak to the dead tonight. You will not attend the Ghosts meeting. (oo) 2) No Mithr || Summon the Acolytes into the court. (1 use) Night - 1) Curse || Bring a dead member back into the Ghosts. They will become an acolyte. (1 use) 2) Rest || Regain another use of Curse (oo) 3) Coming Back || All Ghosts gain death immunity for that night (0 uses)
Seer (Ghost Faction) Passive - 1) Ghost || Speak to the Ghosts at night. 2) Minds Eye || See all content of whispers to and from the Ghosts. Excludes Ghost Leader and Ghost King. Day - 1) Dream || Determine a players classtype (3 uses) 2) Hope || See all content of whispers to and from that player. Can not be used on a Ghost. 3) isolation || Don’t speak to the Ghosts tonight. You will gain a use of Adrenaline. Night - 1) Desperation || Redirect all visitors onto themselves (1 use) 2) Adrenaline || Empower all Ghosts for tonight (0 uses)
Kidnapper (Ghost) Passive - 1) Ghost || Talk to the Ghosts at night. Day - 1) Kidnap || Take a player with you tonight. They will be occupied. You will not meet with the Ghosts tonight (2 uses) 2) Example || Send a message to the court. They will not know who sent it (oo) Night - 1) Mercy || Spare the player you kidnapped. You will gain a use of Kidnap (oo) 2) Execute || kill the player you kidnapped (2 uses) **note: the kidnappers night abilities can only be used if a player has been kidnapped**
Keeper Passive - 1) Ghost || Speak to the Ghosts at night. 2) Keeper || Occupy and Redirect immune. Day - 1) Outlast || Votes cast on you will be cast on another player. (2 uses) 2) Promotion || elect a new Ghost Leader. The previous Leader will become the successors old role (1 use) **note: the new Ghost Leader will start with 0 uses of Gaze** Night - 1) Keep || Occupy a player tonight (oo) 2) Behind Locked Doors || Occupy Every player who visits a Ghost tonight (3 uses)
Warden (Ghost) Passive - 1) Ghost || Speak to the Ghosts tonight. Day - 1) Warn || The last action that happened to a player will be shown to you. Excludes the kings visits. (oo) Night - 1) Spirit Awaken || Return a Dead Ghost to life. They will not join the courts during the day (1 use) 2) Trapped || Redirect a player tonight (oo)
Ghost King (a king allied to the Ghosts faction) Passive - 1) Tenacity || Be able to speak during a trial (_not sure of everything tenacity does, sorry :smile:) _ Day - 1) Royal Finger || Cast double votes 2) Decide Fate || Override all other votes Night - 1) Allies || Determine a Players Faction (4 uses) 2) Guards || Protect a player tonight (2 uses) 3) Spy || See the content of all whispers tomorrow (1 use)
Acolyte (Ghost _follower?_) Passive - 1) Acolyte || See What the Ghosts say at night, but you cannot Speak to them. Day - 1) Half full - || Cast half a vote. Can only be used once the Necromancer uses No Mithr. (1 use) Night - 1) Pass || Your soul will flee from the tethered world. You will no longer be an Acolyte. The Necromancer will gain a use of Coming Back.
_emphasized text_
I’ll add Ghost King and acolyte and BD investigative soon. I’m done, @Lightsin.
